editorialSummary.text: Retail location for a painting supplies manufacturer of both interior & exterior products.

originalText.text: The staff was very helpful when I was trying to find a paint color for my living room.  They were patient when answering my questions about color schemes and types of paint.  The store manager Anthony went out of his way to help me coordinate a delivery at the last minute and even reached out to my local store to make my experience more convenient.

Great customer service

originalText.text: This place is awesome. I made the mistake of going to a big box store and trying to get a paint match there, and my white paint was matched a light yellow, with the the wrong finish (probably my fault on the latter). My wall had a big yellow spot on it afterwards. My mom told me to go to Sherwin-Williams, and the guy there (wish I would have caught his name, my receipt says Anthony) matched me in 10 minutes, and was smart, nice, and really knew what he was doing. I just put this paint up on my wall and it matches *perfectly*. Can't say good enough things about this shop! Don't go anywhere else.

originalText.text: I came to this specific location because I needed a specific color that was sold out on ALL other locations. Not only did they have that color available but they also put it aside for when I was able to pick it up.

originalText.text: The staff very helpful.   I couldn't have picked out colors and samples without Anthony Lewis assistance.
